# samsungcloudplatformv2_iam_policy (Data Source)

Show Policy

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "samsungcloudplatformv2" {
}

data "samsungcloudplatformv2_iam_policy" "policy" {
  id = var.id
}


output "policy" {
  value = data.samsungcloudplatformv2_iam_policy.policy
}

variable "id" {
  type    = string
  default = ""
}
```
